Class GraphingServer

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ButtonListener, ClientListener, ResetListener, OnCommandListener, ExceptionListener, ClientLossListener

    public class GraphingServer
extends AbstractPsychicServer
    A server for live graphing of sensor data
